offers.title: 15% off all meals
offers.description: Valid for lunch and dinner. Cannot be combined with other offers.
offers.terms: Cannot be combined with other offers. Valid for dine-in only.

offers.title: Buy one, get one appetizer
offers.description: Purchase any entree and get a free appetizer of equal or lesser value.
offers.terms: Valid for dine-in only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

offers.title: $10 off dinner for two
offers.description: Save $10 on dinner when dining with a companion.
offers.terms: Valid for dinner only. Minimum purchase of $40 required.

offers.title: 20% off weekend stays
offers.description: Enjoy 20% off your weekend accommodation at Marina Resort.
offers.terms: Valid Friday-Sunday only. Subject to availability. Cannot be combined with other offers.

offers.title: Free breakfast with booking
offers.description: Complimentary breakfast for two when you book a room.
offers.terms: Breakfast value up to $25. Valid for all room types.

offers.title: 10% off boat repairs
offers.description: Save 10% on all marine repair services and maintenance.
offers.terms: Valid for repair services only. Parts and materials excluded.

offers.title: Free boat wash with service
offers.description: Complimentary boat wash when you book any maintenance service.
offers.terms: Wash value up to $50. Valid with any paid service.

offers.title: 15% off safety equipment
offers.description: Save 15% on all marine safety equipment and life jackets.
offers.terms: Valid on safety equipment only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

offers.title: $25 off purchases over $200
offers.description: Save $25 when you spend $200 or more on marine equipment.
offers.terms: Valid on equipment purchases only. Excludes services.

offers.title: 20% off sailing apparel
offers.description: Save 20% on all sailing clothing and gear.
offers.terms: Valid on apparel only. Cannot be combined with other offers.

offers.title: Happy Hour Special
offers.description: 50% off appetizers during happy hour (4-6 PM).

offers.title: Weekday Lunch Deal
offers.description: 20% off lunch entrees Monday through Friday.

offers.title: Extended Stay Discount
offers.description: 15% off stays of 3 nights or more.
offers.terms: Minimum 3-night stay required. Subject to availability.

offers.title: Winter Storage Special
offers.description: 10% off winter boat storage and winterization services.
offers.terms: Valid October through March. Storage and winterization only.

offers.title: Navigation Equipment Sale
offers.description: 25% off all navigation and electronics equipment.
offers.terms: Valid on electronics and navigation equipment only.
